creditline: Gift of Colonel and Mrs. Robert Kane
description: a-symmetrical bowl with pebbled surface on bottom; pebble imbedded in one side; 2 parts of handle pierce bowl, while third part extends below pebble; 2 smaller pebbles on handle; gold and copper colors on silver handle
medium: Sterling silver, brass, stainless steel, copper, pebbles
signed: \"William Mickle\", etched, on bottom of handle
title: Ladle
